verses.text_uthmani: طسٓ ۚ تِلْكَ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ وَكِتَابٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.text: Ṭâ-Sĩn. These are the verses of the Quran; the clear Book.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ta-seen tilka ayatualqur-ani wakitabin mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هُدًى وَبُشْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.text: ˹It is˺ a guide and good news for the believers:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hudan wabushra lilmu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ

translations.text: ˹those˺ who establish prayer, pay alms-tax, and have sure faith in the Hereafter.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allatheena yuqeemoona assalatawayu/toona azzakata wahum bil-akhiratihum yooqinoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ زَيَّنَّا لَهُمْ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ فَهُمْ يَعْمَهُونَ

translations.text: As for those who do not believe in the Hereafter, We have certainly made their ˹evil˺ deeds appealing to them, so they wander blindly.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna allatheena la yu/minoonabil-akhirati zayyanna lahum aAAmalahumfahum yaAAmahoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَهُمْ سُوٓءُ ٱلْعَذَابِ وَهُمْ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلْأَخْسَرُونَ

translations.text: It is they who will suffer a dreadful torment, and in the Hereafter they will ˹truly˺ be the greatest losers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ola-ika allatheena lahum soo-oalAAathabi wahum fee al-akhirati humu al-akhsaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّكَ لَتُلَقَّى ٱلْقُرْءَانَ مِن لَّدُنْ حَكِيمٍ عَلِيمٍ

translations.text: And indeed, you ˹O Prophet˺ are receiving the Quran from the One ˹Who is˺ All-Wise, All-Knowing.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-innaka latulaqqa alqur-anamin ladun hakeemin AAaleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِأَهْلِهِۦٓ إِنِّىٓ ءَانَسْتُ نَارًا سَـَٔاتِيكُم مِّنْهَا بِخَبَرٍ أَوْ ءَاتِيكُم بِشِهَابٍ قَبَسٍ لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَصْطَلُونَ

translations.text: ˹Remember˺ when Moses said to his family, “I have spotted a fire. I will either bring you some directions<sup foot_note=77100>1</sup> from there, or a burning torch so you may warm yourselves.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith qala moosa li-ahlihiinnee anastu naran saateekum minhabikhabarin aw ateekum bishihabin qabasinlaAAallakum tastaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهَا نُودِىَ أَنۢ بُورِكَ مَن فِى ٱلنَّارِ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهَا وَسُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.text: But when he came to it, he was called ˹by Allah˺, “Blessed is the one at the fire, and whoever is around it!<sup foot_note=77101>1</sup> Glory be to Allah, the Lord of all worlds.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falamma jaaha noodiya anboorika man fee annari waman hawlahawasubhana Allahi rabbi alAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ

translations.text: O  Moses! It is truly I. I am Allah—the Almighty, All-Wise.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ya moosa innahu ana AllahualAAazeezu alhakeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَلْقِ عَصَاكَ ۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهَا تَهْتَزُّ كَأَنَّهَا جَآنٌّ وَلَّىٰ مُدْبِرًا وَلَمْ يُعَقِّبْ ۚ يَـٰمُوسَىٰ لَا تَخَفْ إِنِّى لَا يَخَافُ لَدَىَّ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ

translations.text: Now, throw down your staff!” But when he saw it slithering like a snake, he ran away without looking back. ˹Allah reassured him,˺ “O Moses! Do not be afraid! Messengers should have no fear in My presence.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waalqi AAasaka falamma raahatahtazzu kaannaha jannun walla mudbiranwalam yuAAaqqib ya moosa la takhaf innee layakhafu ladayya almursaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا مَن ظَلَمَ ثُمَّ بَدَّلَ حُسْنًۢا بَعْدَ سُوٓءٍ فَإِنِّى غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ

translations.text: ˹Fear is˺ only for those who do wrong. But if they later mend ˹their˺ evil ˹ways˺ with good, then I am certainly All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa man thalama thummabaddala husnan baAAda soo-in fa-innee ghafoorun raheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَدْخِلْ يَدَكَ فِى جَيْبِكَ تَخْرُجْ بَيْضَآءَ مِنْ غَيْرِ سُوٓءٍ ۖ فِى تِسْعِ ءَايَـٰتٍ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَقَوْمِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا فَـٰسِقِينَ

translations.text: Now put your hand through ˹the opening of˺ your collar, it will come out ˹shining˺ white, unblemished.<sup foot_note=77102>1</sup> ˹These are two˺ of nine signs for Pharaoh and his people.<sup foot_note=77103>2</sup> They have truly been a rebellious people.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waadkhil yadaka fee jaybika takhruj baydaamin ghayri soo-in fee tisAAi ayatin ilafirAAawna waqawmihi innahum kanoo qawman fasiqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتْهُمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا مُبْصِرَةً قَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.text: But when Our enlightening signs came to them, they said, “This is pure magic.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falamma jaat-hum ayatunamubsiratan qaloo hatha sihrun mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَحَدُوا۟ بِهَا وَٱسْتَيْقَنَتْهَآ أَنفُسُهُمْ ظُلْمًا وَعُلُوًّا ۚ فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ

translations.text: And, although their hearts were convinced the signs were true, they still denied them wrongfully and arrogantly. See then what was the end of the corruptors!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wajahadoo biha wastayqanat-haanfusuhum thulman waAAuluwwan fanthurkayfa kana AAaqibatu almufsideen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا دَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيْمَـٰنَ عِلْمًا ۖ وَقَالَا ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى فَضَّلَنَا عَلَىٰ كَثِيرٍ مِّنْ عِبَادِهِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.text: Indeed, We granted knowledge to David and Solomon. And they said ˹in acknowledgment˺, “All praise is for Allah Who has privileged us over many of His faithful servants.”<sup foot_note=77104>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad atayna dawoodawasulaymana AAilman waqala alhamdulillahi allathee faddalana AAalakatheerin min AAibadihi almu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَوَرِثَ سُلَيْمَـٰنُ دَاوُۥدَ ۖ وَقَالَ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ عُلِّمْنَا مَنطِقَ ٱلطَّيْرِ وَأُوتِينَا مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْفَضْلُ ٱلْمُبِينُ

translations.text: And David was succeeded by Solomon, who said, “O people! We have been taught the language of birds, and been given everything ˹we need˺. This is indeed a great privilege.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wawaritha sulaymanu dawoodawaqala ya ayyuha annasuAAullimna mantiqa attayri waooteenamin kulli shay-in inna hatha lahuwa alfadlualmubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَحُشِرَ لِسُلَيْمَـٰنَ جُنُودُهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ وَٱلطَّيْرِ فَهُمْ يُوزَعُونَ

translations.text: Solomon’s forces of jinn, humans, and birds were rallied for him, perfectly organized.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahushira lisulaymanajunooduhu mina aljinni wal-insi wattayrifahum yoozaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَتَوْا۟ عَلَىٰ وَادِ ٱلنَّمْلِ قَالَتْ نَمْلَةٌ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّمْلُ ٱدْخُلُوا۟ مَسَـٰكِنَكُمْ لَا يَحْطِمَنَّكُمْ سُلَيْمَـٰنُ وَجُنُودُهُۥ وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ

translations.text: And when they came across a valley of ants, an ant warned, “O ants! Go quickly into your homes so Solomon and his armies do not crush you, unknowingly.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hatta itha ataw AAalawadi annamli qalat namlatun ya ayyuhaannamlu odkhuloo masakinakum la yahtimannakumsulaymanu wajunooduhu wahum la yashAAuroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَتَبَسَّمَ ضَاحِكًا مِّن قَوْلِهَا وَقَالَ رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِىٓ أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَىَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَىَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَـٰلِحًا تَرْضَىٰهُ وَأَدْخِلْنِى بِرَحْمَتِكَ فِى عِبَادِكَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ

translations.text: So Solomon smiled in amusement at her words, and prayed, “My Lord! Inspire me to ˹always˺ be thankful for Your favours which You have blessed me and my parents with, and to do good deeds that please you. Admit me, by Your mercy, into ˹the company of˺ Your righteous servants.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fatabassama dahikan min qawlihawaqala rabbi awziAAnee an ashkura niAAmataka allateeanAAamta AAalayya waAAala walidayya waan aAAmala salihantardahu waadkhilnee birahmatika fee AAibadikaassaliheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَتَفَقَّدَ ٱلطَّيْرَ فَقَالَ مَا لِىَ لَآ أَرَى ٱلْهُدْهُدَ أَمْ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْغَآئِبِينَ

translations.text: ˹One day˺ he inspected the birds, and wondered, “Why is it that I cannot see the hoopoe? Or could he be absent?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watafaqqada attayra faqalama liya la ara alhudhuda am kana minaalgha-ibeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَأُعَذِّبَنَّهُۥ عَذَابًا شَدِيدًا أَوْ لَأَا۟ذْبَحَنَّهُۥٓ أَوْ لَيَأْتِيَنِّى بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.text: I will surely subject him to a severe punishment, or ˹even˺ slaughter him, unless he brings me a compelling excuse.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: LaoAAaththibannahu AAathabanshadeedan aw laathbahannahu aw laya/tiyannee bisultaninmubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَكَثَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ فَقَالَ أَحَطتُ بِمَا لَمْ تُحِطْ بِهِۦ وَجِئْتُكَ مِن سَبَإٍۭ بِنَبَإٍ يَقِينٍ

translation.text: and I have come to you

translations.text: It was not long before the bird came and said, “I have found out something you do not know. I have just come to you from Sheba with sure news.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Famakatha ghayra baAAeedin faqala ahattubima lam tuhit bihi waji/tuka min saba-inbinaba-in yaqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنِّى وَجَدتُّ ٱمْرَأَةً تَمْلِكُهُمْ وَأُوتِيَتْ مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَلَهَا عَرْشٌ عَظِيمٌ

translations.text: Indeed, I found a woman ruling over them,<sup foot_note=77105>1</sup> who has been given everything ˹she needs˺, and who has a magnificent throne.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innee wajadtu imraatan tamlikuhum waootiyatmin kulli shay-in walaha AAarshun AAatheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَدتُّهَا وَقَوْمَهَا يَسْجُدُونَ لِلشَّمْسِ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ فَصَدَّهُمْ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ فَهُمْ لَا يَهْتَدُونَ

translations.text: I found her and her people prostrating to the sun instead of Allah. For Satan has made their deeds appealing to them—hindering them from the ˹Right˺ Way and leaving them unguided—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wajadtuha waqawmaha yasjudoonalishshamsi min dooni Allahi wazayyana lahumu ashshaytanuaAAmalahum fasaddahum AAani assabeeli fahumla yahtadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَلَّا يَسْجُدُوا۟ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى يُخْرِجُ ٱلْخَبْءَ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُخْفُونَ وَمَا تُعْلِنُونَ

translations.text: so they do not prostrate to Allah, Who brings forth what is hidden in the heavens and the earth, and knows what you ˹all˺ conceal and what you reveal.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alla yasjudoo lillahi allatheeyukhriju alkhabaa fee assamawati wal-ardiwayaAAlamu ma tukhfoona wama tuAAlinoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ ۩

translations.text: ˹He is˺ Allah! There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him, the Lord of the Mighty Throne.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allahu la ilaha illahuwa rabbu alAAarshi alAAatheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ

translations.text: Solomon said, “We will see whether you are telling the truth or lying.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala sananthuru asadaqtaam kunta mina alkathibeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱذْهَب بِّكِتَـٰبِى هَـٰذَا فَأَلْقِهْ إِلَيْهِمْ ثُمَّ تَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَٱنظُرْ مَاذَا يَرْجِعُونَ

translations.text: Go with this letter of mine and deliver it to them, then stand aside and see how they will respond.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ithhab bikitabee hathafaalqih ilayhim thumma tawalla AAanhum fanthurmatha yarjiAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَتْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ إِنِّىٓ أُلْقِىَ إِلَىَّ كِتَـٰبٌ كَرِيمٌ

translations.text: The Queen ˹later˺ announced, “O chiefs! Indeed, a noble letter has been delivered to me.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qalat ya ayyuha almalaoinnee olqiya ilayya kitabun kareem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّهُۥ مِن سُلَيْمَـٰنَ وَإِنَّهُۥ بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

translations.text: It is from Solomon, and it reads: ‘In the Name of Allah—the Most Compassionate, Most Merciful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahu min sulaymana wa-innahu bismiAllahi arrahmani arraheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَلَّا تَعْلُوا۟ عَلَىَّ وَأْتُونِى مُسْلِمِينَ

translations.text: Do not be arrogant with me, but come to me, fully submitting ˹to Allah˺.’”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alla taAAloo AAalayya wa/tooneemuslimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَتْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ أَفْتُونِى فِىٓ أَمْرِى مَا كُنتُ قَاطِعَةً أَمْرًا حَتَّىٰ تَشْهَدُونِ

translations.text: She said, “O chiefs! Advise me in this matter of mine, for I would never make any decision without you.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qalat ya ayyuha almalaoaftoonee fee amree ma kuntu qatiAAatan amran hattatashhadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ نَحْنُ أُو۟لُوا۟ قُوَّةٍ وَأُو۟لُوا۟ بَأْسٍ شَدِيدٍ وَٱلْأَمْرُ إِلَيْكِ فَٱنظُرِى مَاذَا تَأْمُرِينَ

translations.text: They responded, “We are a people of strength and great ˹military˺ might, but the decision is yours, so decide what you will command.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo nahnu oloo quwwatinwaoloo ba/sin shadeedin wal-amru ilayki fanthureematha ta/mureen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَتْ إِنَّ ٱلْمُلُوكَ إِذَا دَخَلُوا۟ قَرْيَةً أَفْسَدُوهَا وَجَعَلُوٓا۟ أَعِزَّةَ أَهْلِهَآ أَذِلَّةً ۖ وَكَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ

translations.text: She reasoned, “Indeed, when kings invade a land, they ruin it and debase its nobles. They really do so!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qalat inna almulooka ithadakhaloo qaryatan afsadooha wajaAAaloo aAAizzata ahlihaathillatan wakathalika yafAAaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنِّى مُرْسِلَةٌ إِلَيْهِم بِهَدِيَّةٍ فَنَاظِرَةٌۢ بِمَ يَرْجِعُ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ

translations.text: But I will certainly send him a gift, and see what ˹response˺ my envoys will return with.”<sup foot_note=77106>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-innee mursilatun ilayhim bihadiyyatin fanathiratunbima yarjiAAu almursaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ سُلَيْمَـٰنَ قَالَ أَتُمِدُّونَنِ بِمَالٍ فَمَآ ءَاتَىٰنِۦَ ٱللَّهُ خَيْرٌ مِّمَّآ ءَاتَىٰكُم بَلْ أَنتُم بِهَدِيَّتِكُمْ تَفْرَحُونَ

translations.text: When the chief-envoy came to him, Solomon said, “Do you offer me wealth? What Allah has granted me is far greater than what He has granted you. No! It is you who rejoice in ˹receiving˺ gifts.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falamma jaa sulaymana qalaatumiddoonani bimalin fama ataniyaAllahu khayrun mimma atakum bal antumbihadiyyatikum tafrahoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱرْجِعْ إِلَيْهِمْ فَلَنَأْتِيَنَّهُم بِجُنُودٍ لَّا قِبَلَ لَهُم بِهَا وَلَنُخْرِجَنَّهُم مِّنْهَآ أَذِلَّةً وَهُمْ صَـٰغِرُونَ

translation.text: surely, we will come to them
and surely, we will drive them out

translations.text: Go back to them, for we will certainly mobilize against them forces which they can never resist, and we will drive them out from there in disgrace, fully humbled.”<sup foot_note=77107>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: IrjiAA ilayhim falana/tiyannahum bijunoodinla qibala lahum biha walanukhrijannahum minhaathillatan wahum saghiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ أَيُّكُمْ يَأْتِينِى بِعَرْشِهَا قَبْلَ أَن يَأْتُونِى مُسْلِمِينَ

translations.text: Solomon asked, “O chiefs! Which of you can bring me her throne before they come to me in ˹full˺ submission?”<sup foot_note=77108>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala ya ayyuha almalaoayyukum ya/teenee biAAarshiha qabla an ya/toonee muslimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ عِفْرِيتٌ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبْلَ أَن تَقُومَ مِن مَّقَامِكَ ۖ وَإِنِّى عَلَيْهِ لَقَوِىٌّ أَمِينٌ

translations.text: One mighty jinn responded, “I can bring it to you before you rise from this council of yours. And I am quite strong and trustworthy for this ˹task˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala AAifreetun mina aljinni anaateeka bihi qabla an taqooma min maqamika wa-inneAAalayhi laqawiyyun ameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ ٱلَّذِى عِندَهُۥ عِلْمٌ مِّنَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ أَنَا۠ ءَاتِيكَ بِهِۦ قَبْلَ أَن يَرْتَدَّ إِلَيْكَ طَرْفُكَ ۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهُ مُسْتَقِرًّا عِندَهُۥ قَالَ هَـٰذَا مِن فَضْلِ رَبِّى لِيَبْلُوَنِىٓ ءَأَشْكُرُ أَمْ أَكْفُرُ ۖ وَمَن شَكَرَ فَإِنَّمَا يَشْكُرُ لِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ رَبِّى غَنِىٌّ كَرِيمٌ

translations.text: But the one who had knowledge of the Scripture said,<sup foot_note=77109>1</sup> “I can bring it to you in the blink of an eye.” So when Solomon saw it placed before him, he exclaimed, “This is by the grace of my Lord to test me whether I am grateful or ungrateful. And whoever is grateful, it is only for their own good. But whoever is ungrateful, surely my Lord is Self-Sufficient, Most Generous.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala allathee AAindahu AAilmunmina alkitabi ana ateeka bihi qabla anyartadda ilayka tarfuka falamma raahumustaqirran AAindahu qala hatha min fadlirabbee liyabluwanee aashkuru am akfuru waman shakara fa-innamayashkuru linafsihi waman kafara fa-inna rabbee ghaniyyun kareem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ نَكِّرُوا۟ لَهَا عَرْشَهَا نَنظُرْ أَتَهْتَدِىٓ أَمْ تَكُونُ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَهْتَدُونَ

translations.text: ˹Then˺ Solomon said, “Disguise her throne for her so we may see whether she will recognize ˹it˺ or she will not be able to.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala nakkiroo laha AAarshahananthur atahtadee am takoonu mina allatheenala yahtadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا جَآءَتْ قِيلَ أَهَـٰكَذَا عَرْشُكِ ۖ قَالَتْ كَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ ۚ وَأُوتِينَا ٱلْعِلْمَ مِن قَبْلِهَا وَكُنَّا مُسْلِمِينَ

translations.text: So when she arrived, it was said ˹to her˺, “Is your throne like this?” She replied, “It looks to be the same. We have ˹already˺ received knowledge ˹of Solomon’s prophethood˺<sup foot_note=77110>1</sup> before this ˹miracle˺,<sup foot_note=77111>2</sup> and have submitted ˹to Allah˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falamma jaat qeela ahakathaAAarshuki qalat kaannahu huwa waooteena alAAilmamin qabliha wakunna muslimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَصَدَّهَا مَا كَانَت تَّعْبُدُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّهَا كَانَتْ مِن قَوْمٍ كَـٰفِرِينَ

translations.text: But she had been hindered by what she used to worship instead of Allah, for she was indeed from a disbelieving people.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wasaddaha ma kanattaAAbudu min dooni Allahi innaha kanat minqawmin kafireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قِيلَ لَهَا ٱدْخُلِى ٱلصَّرْحَ ۖ فَلَمَّا رَأَتْهُ حَسِبَتْهُ لُجَّةً وَكَشَفَتْ عَن سَاقَيْهَا ۚ قَالَ إِنَّهُۥ صَرْحٌ مُّمَرَّدٌ مِّن قَوَارِيرَ ۗ قَالَتْ رَبِّ إِنِّى ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِى وَأَسْلَمْتُ مَعَ سُلَيْمَـٰنَ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.text: Then she was told, “Enter the palace.” But when she saw the hall, she thought it was a body of water, so she bared her legs. Solomon said. “It is just a palace paved with crystal.” ˹At last˺ she declared, “My Lord! I have certainly wronged my soul. Now I ˹fully˺ submit myself along with Solomon to Allah, the Lord of all worlds.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qeela laha odkhulee assarhafalamma raat-hu hasibat-hu lujjatan wakashafat AAansaqayha qala innahu sarhunmumarradun min qawareera qalat rabbi innee thalamtunafsee waaslamtu maAAa sulaymana lillahi rabbi alAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمْ صَـٰلِحًا أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ فَإِذَا هُمْ فَرِيقَانِ يَخْتَصِمُونَ

translations.text: And We certainly sent to the people of Thamûd their brother Ṣâliḥ, proclaiming, “Worship Allah,” but they suddenly split into two opposing groups.<sup foot_note=77112>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad arsalna ila thamoodaakhahum salihan ani oAAbudoo Allahafa-itha hum fareeqani yakhtasimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ لِمَ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ قَبْلَ ٱلْحَسَنَةِ ۖ لَوْلَا تَسْتَغْفِرُونَ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ

translations.text: He urged ˹the disbelieving group˺, “O my people! Why do you ˹seek to˺ hasten the torment<sup foot_note=77113>1</sup> rather than grace?<sup foot_note=77114>2</sup> If only you sought Allah’s forgiveness so you may be shown mercy!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala ya qawmi limatastaAAjiloona bissayyi-ati qabla alhasanati lawlatastaghfiroona Allaha laAAallakum turhamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ ٱطَّيَّرْنَا بِكَ وَبِمَن مَّعَكَ ۚ قَالَ طَـٰٓئِرُكُمْ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ تُفْتَنُونَ

translation.text: We consider you a bad omen
We consider you a bad omen

translations.text: They replied, “You and your followers are a bad omen for us.”<sup foot_note=77115>1</sup> He responded, “Your omens are destined by Allah. In fact, you are ˹only˺ a people being tested.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo ittayyarna bikawabiman maAAaka qala ta-irukum AAinda Allahibal antum qawmun tuftanoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَانَ فِى ٱلْمَدِينَةِ تِسْعَةُ رَهْطٍ يُفْسِدُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ

translations.text: And there were in the city nine ˹elite˺ men who spread corruption in the land, never doing what is right.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakana fee almadeenati tisAAatu rahtinyufsidoona fee al-ardi wala yuslihoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ تَقَاسَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ لَنُبَيِّتَنَّهُۥ وَأَهْلَهُۥ ثُمَّ لَنَقُولَنَّ لِوَلِيِّهِۦ مَا شَهِدْنَا مَهْلِكَ أَهْلِهِۦ وَإِنَّا لَصَـٰدِقُونَ

translation.text: surely, we will attack him by night

translations.text: They vowed, “Let us swear by Allah that we will take him and his family down by night. Then we will certainly say to his ˹closest˺ heirs, ‘We did not witness the murder of his family. We are definitely telling the truth.’”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo taqasamoo billahilanubayyitannahu waahlahu thumma lanaqoolanna liwaliyyihi mashahidna mahlika ahlihi wa-inna lasadiqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًا وَمَكَرْنَا مَكْرًا وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ

translations.text: And ˹so˺ they made a plan, but We too made a plan, while they were unaware.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wamakaroo makran wamakarna makranwahum la yashAAuroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ مَكْرِهِمْ أَنَّا دَمَّرْنَـٰهُمْ وَقَوْمَهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

translations.text: See then what the consequences of their plan were: We ˹utterly˺ destroyed them and their people all together.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fanthur kayfa kanaAAaqibatu makrihim anna dammarnahumwaqawmahum ajmaAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَتِلْكَ بُيُوتُهُمْ خَاوِيَةًۢ بِمَا ظَلَمُوٓا۟ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يَعْلَمُونَ

translations.text: So their homes are there, ˹but completely˺ ruined because of their wrongdoing. Surely in this is a lesson for people of knowledge.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fatilka buyootuhum khawiyatan bimathalamoo inna fee thalika laayatanliqawmin yaAAlamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنجَيْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ يَتَّقُونَ

translations.text: And We delivered those who were faithful and were mindful ˹of Allah˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waanjayna allatheena amanoowakanoo yattaqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلُوطًا إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِۦٓ أَتَأْتُونَ ٱلْفَـٰحِشَةَ وَأَنتُمْ تُبْصِرُونَ

translations.text: And ˹remember˺ Lot, when he rebuked ˹the men of˺ his people, “Do you commit that shameful deed while you can see ˹one another˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walootan ith qalaliqawmihi ata/toona alfahishata waantum tubsiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَئِنَّكُمْ لَتَأْتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ شَهْوَةً مِّن دُونِ ٱلنِّسَآءِ ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ تَجْهَلُونَ

translations.text: Do you really lust after men instead of women? In fact, you are ˹only˺ a people acting ignorantly.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: A-innakum lata/toona arrijalashahwatan min dooni annisa-i bal antum qawmuntajhaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ فَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوْمِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓا۟ أَخْرِجُوٓا۟ ءَالَ لُوطٍ مِّن قَرْيَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ أُنَاسٌ يَتَطَهَّرُونَ

translations.text: But his people’s only response was to say, “Expel Lot’s followers from your land! They are a people who wish to remain chaste!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fama kana jawabaqawmihi illa an qaloo akhrijoo ala lootinmin qaryatikum innahum onasun yatatahharoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمْرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرْنَـٰهَا مِنَ ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ

translations.text: So We delivered him and his family, except his wife. We had destined her to be one of the doomed.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faanjaynahu waahlahu illaimraatahu qaddarnaha mina alghabireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًا ۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ

translations.text: And We poured upon them a rain ˹of brimstone˺. How evil was the rain of those who had been warned!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waamtarna AAalayhim mataranfasaa mataru almunthareen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَسَلَـٰمٌ عَلَىٰ عِبَادِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱصْطَفَىٰٓ ۗ ءَآللَّهُ خَيْرٌ أَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Praise be to Allah, and peace be upon the servants He has chosen.” ˹Ask the disbelievers,˺ “Which is better: Allah or whatever ˹gods˺ they associate ˹with Him˺?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Quli alhamdu lillahi wasalamunAAala AAibadihi allatheena istafaallahu khayrun amma yushrikoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَأَنۢبَتْنَا بِهِۦ حَدَآئِقَ ذَاتَ بَهْجَةٍ مَّا كَانَ لَكُمْ أَن تُنۢبِتُوا۟ شَجَرَهَآ ۗ أَءِلَـٰهٌ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ يَعْدِلُونَ

translations.text: Or ˹ask them,˺ “Who created the heavens and the earth, and sends down rain for you from the sky, by which We cause delightful gardens to grow? You could never cause their trees to grow. Was it another god besides Allah?” Absolutely not! But they are a people who set up equals ˹to Allah˺!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Amman khalaqa assamawatiwal-arda waanzala lakum mina assama-imaan faanbatna bihi hada-iqa thatabahjatin ma kana lakum an tunbitoo shajarahaa-ilahun maAAa Allahi bal hum qawmun yaAAdiloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمَّن جَعَلَ ٱلْأَرْضَ قَرَارًا وَجَعَلَ خِلَـٰلَهَآ أَنْهَـٰرًا وَجَعَلَ لَهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَجَعَلَ بَيْنَ ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ حَاجِزًا ۗ أَءِلَـٰهٌ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

translations.text: Or ˹ask them,˺ “Who made the earth a place of settlement, caused rivers to flow through it, placed firm mountains upon it, and set a barrier between ˹fresh and salt˺ bodies of water?<sup foot_note=77116>1</sup> Was it another god besides Allah?” Absolutely not! But most of them do not know.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Amman jaAAala al-arda qararanwajaAAala khilalaha anharan wajaAAala laharawasiya wajaAAala bayna albahrayni hajizana-ilahun maAAa Allahi bal aktharuhum layaAAlamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمَّن يُجِيبُ ٱلْمُضْطَرَّ إِذَا دَعَاهُ وَيَكْشِفُ ٱلسُّوٓءَ وَيَجْعَلُكُمْ خُلَفَآءَ ٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ أَءِلَـٰهٌ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ

translations.text: Or ˹ask them,˺ “Who responds to the distressed when they cry to Him, relieving ˹their˺ affliction, and ˹Who˺ makes you successors in the earth? Is it another god besides Allah? Yet you are hardly mindful!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Amman yujeebu almudtarra ithadaAAahu wayakshifu assoo-a wayajAAalukum khulafaaal-ardi a-ilahun maAAa Allahi qaleelan matathakkaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمَّن يَهْدِيكُمْ فِى ظُلُمَـٰتِ ٱلْبَرِّ وَٱلْبَحْرِ وَمَن يُرْسِلُ ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ بُشْرًۢا بَيْنَ يَدَىْ رَحْمَتِهِۦٓ ۗ أَءِلَـٰهٌ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ تَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ

translations.text: Or ˹ask them,˺ “Who guides you in the darkness of the land and sea,<sup foot_note=77117>1</sup> and sends the winds ushering in His mercy?<sup foot_note=77118>2</sup> Is it another god besides Allah? Exalted is Allah above what they associate ˹with Him˺!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Amman yahdeekum fee thulumatialbarri walbahri waman yursilu arriyahabushran bayna yaday rahmatihi a-ilahun maAAa AllahitaAAala Allahu AAamma yushrikoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمَّن يَبْدَؤُا۟ ٱلْخَلْقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥ وَمَن يَرْزُقُكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ أَءِلَـٰهٌ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ قُلْ هَاتُوا۟ بُرْهَـٰنَكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ

translations.text: Or ˹ask them,˺ “Who originates the creation then resurrects it, and gives you provisions from the heavens and the earth? Is it another god besides Allah?” Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Show ˹me˺ your proof, if what you say is true.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Amman yabdao alkhalqa thumma yuAAeeduhuwaman yarzuqukum mina assama-i wal-ardia-ilahun maAAa Allahi qul hatoo burhanakumin kuntum sadiqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُل لَّا يَعْلَمُ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلْغَيْبَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبْعَثُونَ

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “None in the heavens and the earth has knowledge of the unseen except Allah. Nor do they know when they will be resurrected.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul la yaAAlamu man fee assamawatiwal-ardi alghayba illa Allahu wamayashAAuroona ayyana yubAAathoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: بَلِ ٱدَّٰرَكَ عِلْمُهُمْ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّ مِّنْهَا ۖ بَلْ هُم مِّنْهَا عَمُونَ

translations.text: No! Their knowledge of the Hereafter amounts to ignorance. In fact, they are in doubt about it. In truth, they are ˹totally˺ blind to it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bali iddaraka AAilmuhum fee al-akhiratibal hum fee shakkin minha bal hum minha AAamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَءِذَا كُنَّا تُرَٰبًا وَءَابَآؤُنَآ أَئِنَّا لَمُخْرَجُونَ

translations.text: The disbelievers ask, “When we and our fathers are reduced to dust, will we really be brought forth ˹alive˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqala allatheena kafaroo a-ithakunna turaban waabaona a-innalamukhrajoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَقَدْ وُعِدْنَا هَـٰذَا نَحْنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا مِن قَبْلُ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translations.text: We have already been promised this, as well as our forefathers earlier. This is nothing but ancient fables!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Laqad wuAAidna hatha nahnuwaabaona min qablu in hatha illaasateeru al-awwaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ سِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Travel throughout the land and see the fate of the wicked.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul seeroo fee al-ardi fanthurookayfa kana AAaqibatu almujrimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا تَكُن فِى ضَيْقٍ مِّمَّا يَمْكُرُونَ

translations.text: Do not grieve for them, nor be distressed by their schemes.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wala tahzan AAalayhim walatakun fee dayqin mimma yamkuroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ

translations.text: They ask ˹the believers˺, “When will this threat come to pass, if what you say is true?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayaqooloona mata hathaalwaAAdu in kuntum sadiqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ رَدِفَ لَكُم بَعْضُ ٱلَّذِى تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Perhaps some of what you seek to hasten is close at hand.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul AAasa an yakoona radifa lakumbaAAdu allathee tastaAAjiloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو فَضْلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَشْكُرُونَ

translations.text: Surely your Lord is ever Bountiful to humanity,<sup foot_note=77119>1</sup> but most of them are ungrateful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna rabbaka lathoo fadlinAAala annasi walakinna aktharahum layashkuroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمْ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ

translations.text: And surely your Lord knows what their hearts conceal and what they reveal.<sup foot_note=77120>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna rabbaka layaAAlamu ma tukinnusudooruhum wama yuAAlinoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا مِنْ غَآئِبَةٍ فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا فِى كِتَـٰبٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.text: For there is nothing hidden in the heavens or the earth without being ˹written˺ in a perfect Record.<sup foot_note=77121>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama min gha-ibatin fee assama-iwal-ardi illa fee kitabin mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ يَقُصُّ عَلَىٰ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ أَكْثَرَ ٱلَّذِى هُمْ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ

translations.text: Indeed, this Quran clarifies for the Children of Israel most of what they differ over.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna hatha alqur-ana yaqussuAAala banee isra-eela akthara allathee humfeehi yakhtalifoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَهُدًى وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.text: And it is truly a guide and mercy for the believers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-innahu lahudan warahmatunlilmu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقْضِى بَيْنَهُم بِحُكْمِهِۦ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ

translations.text: Your Lord will certainly judge between them by His justice, for He is the Almighty, All-Knowing.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna rabbaka yaqdee baynahum bihukmihiwahuwa alAAazeezu alAAaleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَى ٱلْحَقِّ ٱلْمُبِينِ

translations.text: So put your trust in Allah, for you are surely upon the ˹Path of˺ clear truth.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fatawakkal AAala Allahi innakaAAala alhaqqi almubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّكَ لَا تُسْمِعُ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَلَا تُسْمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا وَلَّوْا۟ مُدْبِرِينَ

translations.text: You certainly cannot make the dead hear ˹the truth˺. Nor can you make the deaf hear the call when they turn their backs and walk away.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innaka la tusmiAAu almawta walatusmiAAu assumma adduAAaa ithawallaw mudbireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَآ أَنتَ بِهَـٰدِى ٱلْعُمْىِ عَن ضَلَـٰلَتِهِمْ ۖ إِن تُسْمِعُ إِلَّا مَن يُؤْمِنُ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا فَهُم مُّسْلِمُونَ

translations.text: Nor can you lead the blind out of their misguidance. You can make none hear ˹the truth˺ except those who believe in Our revelations, ˹fully˺ submitting ˹to Allah˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama anta bihadee alAAumyiAAan dalalatihim in tusmiAAu illa manyu/minu bi-ayatina fahum muslimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَإِذَا وَقَعَ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَيْهِمْ أَخْرَجْنَا لَهُمْ دَآبَّةً مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ تُكَلِّمُهُمْ أَنَّ ٱلنَّاسَ كَانُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا لَا يُوقِنُونَ

translations.text: And when the decree ˹of the Hour˺ comes to pass against them, We will bring forth for them a beast from the earth,<sup foot_note=77122>1</sup> telling them that the people had no sure faith in Our revelations.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-itha waqaAAa alqawlu AAalayhimakhrajna lahum dabbatan mina al-arditukallimuhum anna annasa kanoo bi-ayatinala yooqinoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَوْمَ نَحْشُرُ مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٍ فَوْجًا مِّمَّن يُكَذِّبُ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا فَهُمْ يُوزَعُونَ

translations.text: ˹Watch for˺ the Day We will gather from every faith-community a group of those who denied Our revelations, and they will be driven in ranks.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayawma nahshuru min kulli ommatinfawjan mimman yukaththibu bi-ayatinafahum yoozaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءُو قَالَ أَكَذَّبْتُم بِـَٔايَـٰتِى وَلَمْ تُحِيطُوا۟ بِهَا عِلْمًا أَمَّاذَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

translations.text: When they ˹finally˺ come before their Lord, He will ask ˹them˺, “Did you deny My revelations without ˹even˺ comprehending them? Or what ˹exactly˺ did you do?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hatta itha jaooqala akaththabtum bi-ayatee walam tuheetoobiha AAilman ammatha kuntum taAAmaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَوَقَعَ ٱلْقَوْلُ عَلَيْهِم بِمَا ظَلَمُوا۟ فَهُمْ لَا يَنطِقُونَ

translations.text: And the decree ˹of torment˺ will be justified against them for their wrongdoing, leaving them speechless.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WawaqaAAa alqawlu AAalayhim bima thalamoofahum la yantiqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا جَعَلْنَا ٱلَّيْلَ لِيَسْكُنُوا۟ فِيهِ وَٱلنَّهَارَ مُبْصِرًا ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ

translations.text: Do they not see that We made the night for them to rest in and the day bright?<sup foot_note=77123>1</sup> Surely in this are signs for those who believe.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alam yaraw anna jaAAalnaallayla liyaskunoo feehi wannahara mubsiraninna fee thalika laayatin liqawmin yu/minoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَفَزِعَ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَكُلٌّ أَتَوْهُ دَٰخِرِينَ

translations.text: And ˹beware of˺ the Day the Trumpet will be blown, and all those in the heavens and all those on the earth will be horrified ˹to the point of death˺,<sup foot_note=77124>1</sup> except those Allah wills ˹to spare˺. And all will come before Him, fully humbled.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayawma yunfakhu fee assoorifafaziAAa man fee assamawati waman feeal-ardi illa man shaa Allahu wakullunatawhu dakhireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَتَرَى ٱلْجِبَالَ تَحْسَبُهَا جَامِدَةً وَهِىَ تَمُرُّ مَرَّ ٱلسَّحَابِ ۚ صُنْعَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَتْقَنَ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ خَبِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَفْعَلُونَ

translations.text: Now you see the mountains, thinking they are firmly fixed, but they are travelling ˹just˺ like clouds. ˹That is˺ the design of Allah, Who has perfected everything. Surely He is All-Aware of what you do.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watara aljibala tahsabuhajamidatan wahiya tamurru marra assahabi sunAAaAllahi allathee atqana kulla shay-in innahukhabeerun bima tafAAaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَن جَآءَ بِٱلْحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُۥ خَيْرٌ مِّنْهَا وَهُم مِّن فَزَعٍ يَوْمَئِذٍ ءَامِنُونَ

translations.text: Whoever comes with a good deed will be rewarded with what is better, and they will be secure from the horror on that Day.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Man jaa bilhasanatifalahu khayrun minha wahum min fazaAAin yawma-ithinaminoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَن جَآءَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ فَكُبَّتْ وُجُوهُهُمْ فِى ٱلنَّارِ هَلْ تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

translations.text: And whoever comes with an evil deed will be hurled face-first into the Fire. Are you rewarded except for what you used to do?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waman jaa bissayyi-atifakubbat wujoohuhum fee annari hal tujzawna illama kuntum taAAmaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّمَآ أُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَعْبُدَ رَبَّ هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْبَلْدَةِ ٱلَّذِى حَرَّمَهَا وَلَهُۥ كُلُّ شَىْءٍ ۖ وَأُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I have only been commanded to worship the Lord of this city ˹of Mecca˺, Who has made it sacred, and to Him belongs everything. And I am commanded to be one of those who ˹fully˺ submit ˹to Him˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innama omirtu an aAAbuda rabba hathihialbaldati allathee harramaha walahu kullushay-in waomirtu an akoona mina almuslimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنْ أَتْلُوَا۟ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ ۖ فَمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَهْتَدِى لِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَقُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُنذِرِينَ

translations.text: and to recite the Quran.” Then whoever chooses to be guided, it is only for their own good. But whoever chooses to stray, say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I am only a warner.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waan atluwa alqur-ana famani ihtadafa-innama yahtadee linafsihi waman dalla faqulinnama ana mina almunthireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ سَيُرِيكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ فَتَعْرِفُونَهَا ۚ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَـٰفِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ

translations.text: And say, “All praise is for Allah! He will show you His signs, and you will recognize them. And your Lord is never unaware of what you do.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waquli alhamdu lillahisayureekum ayatihi fataAArifoonaha wamarabbuka bighafilin AAamma taAAmaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
